tag_list: fortune-teller, psychic, online-fortune-teller, online-psychic, clairvoyant, palm-reading, tarot-cards, numerology, palmistry, astrolofgy
overview: Madame Zora is the premier online psychic and fortune teller. She is expert in the art of tarot, numerology, astrology and palm reading. Zora has made it her mission to bring clarity and happiness to people from all over the World by sending personalized fortunes and the mail, and to inspire people with a daily quote on her blog.
